jyzer.items.attributes.types
Class AttributeInfo

java.lang.Object
  jyzer.items.attributes.types.AttributeInfo
Direct Known Subclasses:
CodeAttribute, ConstantValueAttribute, DeprecatedAttribute, DummyAttribute, EnclosingMethodAttribute, ExceptionsAttribute, InnerClassesAttribute, LineNumberTableAttribute, LocalVariableTableAttribute, LocalVariableTypeTableAttribute, SignatureAttribute, SourceDebugExtensionAttribute, SourceFileAttribute, SyntheticAttribute
public abstract class AttributeInfo
extends java.lang.Object

The superclass of the attributes. All attributes have the following general format:

attribute_info {
u2 attribute_name_index;
u4 attribute_length;
u1 info[attribute_length];
}

Version:
1.0, 2005. nov. 12.
Author:
Legendi Richard Oliver

Method Detail

getHTMLDescription

public abstract void getHTMLDescription(java.lang.StringBuilder sb)
Concatenates a HTML string that represents this class ( looks cool! ) to the end of the given StringBiulder object. Using this method for improve efficiency, cause I had a lot of problems with displaying such a long HTML text in an EditorPane.

Parameters:
sb - a StringBuilder that contains the string representation of the full classfile.
